content: if you have a hard time finding sweaters small enough for your furry friend its time to try this pattern for itty bitty crochet dog sweaters the smallest size is xxxs and fits carmen who weighs 1 9 lbs ~860g the tan chihuahua is henry and he weighs 5 lbs 2265g and is modeling the xs size follow along with the video here https //youtu be/m3acvxneubm
